content: Portfolio occupancy reduced slightly in this year and this quarter, mainly explained by the B theory -- the B class A plus and A occupancy reached 82%, while the average rental price stood at levels of $25 per square meter per month. Then in CÃ³rdoba, right beside our Shopping CÃ³rdoba, we made a barter agreement, it's worth $2 million and we're going to be receiving in the next 36 months the 16% of the selling of departments in the building. On top of that, you have the offices and the hotels and we can see the strong recovery of our shopping malls reaching this quarter $31.1 million of EBITDA on that are very, very good levels, even more than 2019 numbers.
